name: The king is dead, long live the king
name_original: The king is dead, long live the king
description:
A game about keeping the king alive for as long as possible.

Supply the king with food and water while killing enemies to make sure the king survives as long as possible! Once the king has died you can purchase upgrades with gold you recovered from the killed enemies.

Controls:

WASD / Arrows / Controller — Movement

F / Left Mouse / Controller button 0 — Interact & Attack

G / Right Mouse / Controller button 1 — Drop interactable
